narrative.narrative: Germania, legally Germania Fluggesellschaft mbH, is a privately owned German airline with its headquarters in Berlin.[1] Germania operates scheduled and charter flights to destinations in Europe, North Africa and the Middle East from several German bases. It carried 2.5 million passengers in 2009 and had around 850 employees as of summer 2014.[2]

prefereds.aircrafts: Boeing 737-700,Airbus A319-100,Airbus A321-200,Boeing 737-300,Fokker 100,Fokker F27,Boeing 727-100, Airbus A320neo
